metadata.name: Scheduled Task Executing Encoded Payload from Registry
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a schtask that potentially executes a base64 encoded payload stored in the Windows Registry using PowerShell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('schtasks.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/create')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('frombase64string')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('encodedcommand'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-itemproperty')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' gp '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkcu:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hklm:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('registry::')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a schtask that potentially executes a base64 encoded payload stored in the Windows Registry using PowerShell.
